text: Battle of Vyborg Bay can refer to three battles: *Battle of Vyborg Bay (1790), between Russia and Sweden during the Russo-Swedish War (1788–90) *Battle of Vyborg (1918), when Vyborg was captured by the Whites from the Reds during the Finnish Civil War *Battle of Vyborg Bay (1944), between the Soviet Union and Finland during World War II
title: Battle of Vyborg Bay
